tags.description: Article needs cleanup
Article needs to be rewritten to comply with Wikipedia's style guidelines
Some external links used in the article do not comply with policies
Article may have been copied from another source that potentially violates copyright policy
Article not added to any categories
Subject of the article may not be notable

items.label: Notability: subject does not meet the following criteria

tags.description: Article written like an advertisement
Article does not follow guidelines on use of different tenses.
Article is written like a personal opinion or essay
Article is written from a fan's point of view
Article is written like a handbook or guidebook
Article uses first-person or second-person inappropiately
Article is written like a manual or guidebook
Article is too technical for most readers to understand
Article's tone does not adhere to the formal and serious tone expected in an encyclopedia
Article insufficient context for those unfamiliar with the subject
Article contains content that is confusing to readers or has unclear expressions
Article's style and content do not clearly distinguish between fact and fiction
Article is incomplete in a specific area
Article requires input from experts to improve

items.name: expertNeeded
items.label: Relevant WikiProject:
items.help: Optionally enter the name of a WikiProject. Do not include the 'WikiProject' prefix.

items.name: expertNeededReason
items.label: Reason:
items.help: A brief explanation of the issue that requires expert input. A reason or discussion link is required.

items.name: expertNeededTalk
items.label: Discussion:
items.help: The section name on the discussion page of the article where the issue is being discussed. Do not enter a link, just the section name. A reason or discussion link is required.

tags.description: Article gives undue weight to various opinions, events, or controversies
Article makes predictions about future events that may not have happened yet
Article is about a current event
This person is associated with a current event
Article needs to be updated for accuracy and reliability
Article may be entirely fraudulent
Article does not reflect a global perspective on the subject
Article is an autobiography or has been extensively edited by someone closely connected to the subject
This article may be biased
Article is currently the subject of ongoing controversies
Article may have been created or edited for payment, such as conflicts of interest
Information in the article has been viewed from the perspective of a specific region
Article lacks reliable sources from reputable publications
Article needs additional sources for verification
Article lacks any references or sources
Article contains original research, unverifiable claims, or editorial opinions
Article contains inappropriate references to self-published sources
Article relies entirely or predominantly on a single source
Article relies too much on third-party sources closely associated with the subject
Article closely resembles another article and should be merged
The histories of this article and another article need to be merged

items.name: histmergeOriginalPage
items.label: Other page:
items.help: Name of the page that needs to be merged (required).

items.name: histmergeReason
items.label: Reason:
items.help: A brief explanation of why the merger of histories is necessary.

tags.description: Article in the process of an expansion or major restructuring
